Name: Elder & Wiser
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Apple and elderflower combine well with whiskey.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly and named for its original base, Wiser's Canadian whisky with elder-flower liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Elder & Wiser contains 178 calories
